channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation cools in April — but tariffs could upend the picture in coming months
item.description: Consumer prices in April were up 2.3% from a year ago, the smallest annual increase in more than four years. Grocery prices fell 0.4%, thanks to a lar...

item.title: Champagne-makers mull if it's time to move on from the U.S. market
item.description: Amid uncertainty around President Trump's tariffs, some Champagne-makers say they're losing trust in the U.S. market.

item.title: Importers respond U.S.-China tariff cuts. And, takeaways from day 1 of Diddy's trial
item.description: Importers are ready to get back to business after the U.S. cut tariffs on China, but uncertainty looms. And, media mogul Diddy's first day of trial he...

item.title: UnitedHealth Group abruptly replaces CEO Andrew Witty, deepening a terrible year
item.description: The health care conglomerate is facing mounting financial problems – and ongoing consumer anger over high costs and denied claims.

item.title: A matchmaking service with a twist: Connecting big givers to programs cut by USAID
item.description: A former USAID worker has a new mission. She's hoping to connect philanthropists with overseas programs that have lost — or are likely to lose — their...

item.title: What to know about California Gov. Gavin Newsom’s move to ban encampments
Watch timelapse of Trump's marathon handshake session with Saudis
item.description: Dozens of senior officials, military leaders and businessmen queued to greet the US president in Saudi Arabia.

item.title: Kim Kardashian takes stand in Paris trial over 2016 armed robbery
item.description: Kim Kardashian took the witness stand at the Paris trial of 10 people who stand accused over a 2016 robbery in the French capital during which she was...

item.title: White South Africans fast-tracked into U.S., granted refugee status by Trump
item.description: The Trump administration greeted 59 White South Africans at Dulles International Airport following the group's expedited request for refugee status, c...

item.title: Zambia warns diplomats after US reveals 'systematic' aid theft
item.description: The foreign minister says raising concerns publicly amounts to interference in domestic affairs.

item.title: May 13: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: President Trump delivers remarks at a U.S.-Saudi investment summit; New NOAA data shows carbon dioxide levels in the environment are at all time high ...

item.title: Budget airline begins deportation flights for ICE with start of Arizona operations
item.description: A U.S. budget airline has begun making deportation flights out of an Arizona airport, an unusual and controversial move for a company that depends hea...

item.title: Cassie testifies "control was everything" in Sean "Diddy" Combs' trial – live updates
item.description: The singer known as Cassie is on the stand today in Sean "Diddy" Combs' federal sex trafficking and racketeering trial in NYC.

item.title: Zelensky vows to 'do everything' to ensure direct talks with Putin in Turkey
item.description: Russia has not yet said who it will send to Istanbul on Thursday and has refused to respond to ultimatums.

item.title: Menendez brothers' long-awaited resentencing hearing to begin
item.description: It will determine whether they should receive a lesser sentence, which could ultimately lead to their paroled release.

item.title: Trump speaks after White House announces $600 billion Saudi investment deal
item.description: President Trump delivered remarks Tuesday at a U.S.-Saudi investment summit, as he marks his first international trip of his second term.

item.title: Campus protests flare on a smaller scale than last spring, but with higher stakes
Germany arrests self-declared 'king' and bans his extremist group
item.description: Police arrest the leaders of Germany's largest Reichsbürger faction, that calls itself "Kingdom of Germany".
